attributes.action: brent council must stop causing families mental breakdowns
attributes.background: increasing rates of depression going up due to brent council

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition calling for the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You'll name to provide your full name or first initial plus your surname.

You could make a complaint to Brent Council. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.brent.gov.uk/your-council/complaints/

Your MP may be able to take up your issue on your behalf. You can find out who your MP is here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
